about_the_game:
Caution!
If you buy a DLC included in the bundle, you can not purchase the bundle version.


Conon has appeared on "Trouble☆Witches Origin!"
One of four characters newly added in "Trouble☆Witches AC", "Louis" appears in "Trouble☆Witches Origin!"

The story also renewed for Origin!

Voice is newly recorded for Origin!

*When you purchase this download content, you can play with the additional character "Conon" with "Trouble☆Witches Origin!".

------------------------------------------------------
Trouble Witches Origin！　
Additional Character Conon. Outline

OS : Ｗindows 7/8/8.1/10
Processor : Intel Corei3 or Higher
Memory : 2GB RAM
Graphics : Support to DirectX11 Graphics
Sound Card : Support to DirectSound Soundcard
Storage : 500MB available space
DirectX : Version 11

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support to DirectX11 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support to DirectSound Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: For multi monitor, full screen operation is not guaranteed in Windows 7 Aero "*Scheduled for coming soon". DirectX End-User Runtime *About a controller besides I recommend a controller for X-input. About the controller except X-input, I cannot guarantee normal movement.
